name: Andromeda, the last defense.
description:
You are the last defense. This is your final mission.

The F.R.R.A. Army has declared war on your home solar system. Since your civilization doesn't stand a chance against the replicant forces of the enemies, you decide that you'll sacrifice yourself in order to buy time for your kind to flee to another galaxy.

Controls: 

W/A/S/D or arrows to move.
Space to shoot.

Known bugs: 

./ If the player still has a triple shot powerup while picking up another one, the last one will not give the player extra powerup time.

./ Enemy explosions will flicker sometimes.
